website_summaries.verdict: Keep everything organized with the three compartments in this cosmetic bag.
pros: Made from top-grade, oxford fabric, this waterproof case is perfect for holding makeup palettes and other cosmetics
We love how you have the ability to redesign your own compartment
cons: Some makeup brushes might be too long for the case
The zipper has been faulty for some people

customer_reviews.title: Don't let size fool you
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box I was disappointed in the size, it's smaller than my usual travel case but I was so wrong! Currently packing for my trip and it fits not only all my makeup but my skin care and razor too!! From my experience: Fits: sigma brushes, MUG brushes, morphe M collection brushes, cover fx custom drops bottle (standing), ABH eyeshadow palette in the zipper compartment Doesn't fit: morphe elite collection brushes, morphe eyeshadow palettes, large fluffy brushes My pictures speak for themselves with how much this thing holds! The size of it is about as big as a morphe palette
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly structured make-up travel kit. Safe and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag upon Katie Jayne Hughes’ recommendation and so far I am not disappointed. A place for everything and everything in it’s place. Sturdy and protective for travel. Can easily and safely fit all my day to day skin care, make-up (including alt options). Dividers are sturdy and customizable. They are able to Velcro in and Velcro out to change shape of compartments. I’m a big fan and plan to buy more for Christmas gifts. Bottom line, this is a great structured make-up bag and it suits my needs perfectly. In fact, I’m still using my make-up right out of it even now that I am home. I love the organization of it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bauer Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, fits all my makeup brushes and makeup very well. The compartment walls are thick and sturdy. Previous Makeup bags I purchased from amazon were thin and made of poor material. This feels well-made and seems like it will hold up for a while. The pocket with the zipper fits long rectangular palettes perfectly. Everything I need fits great and can be organized. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a TON of makeup, but I was looking for something to hold it all and use for travel and home. This seems to be VERY well built and not cheap material or zippers like most. Love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Crappy zippers
customer_reviews.text: The product looked very nice, but when I tried to open it, the zipper broke.... well, I thought it was a vad zipper and that is ok, it can happen.... guess what!!! When tried the other zipper, same thing!!!!!! Both zippers broke before Incould open the case. I ordered zipper fix online, and I work around it. The zippers were VERY CRAPY!! I hope the rest is better quality. On the inside is very nice, the materials dont look high quality, but I hope to be wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: ... lot and this was finally a bag I could like. I can fit my makeup
customer_reviews.text: I travels a lot and this was finally a bag I could like. I can fit my makeup, hair stuff and dental stuff all in this bag. It was a bit bigger than I thought, but when I packed it, the size was perfect for the carry on and it held everything. The zipper works well, and the compartments can be changed by moving the velcro dividers if you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, this is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent soo much money trying to find the perfect bag & i finally found it. I love the dividers, it's a perfect touch. This is how makeup bags should be made, with dividers. The makeup stays organized in the compartments instead of loose in the bag. The slots for the brushes, are the perfect size. They hold regular size brushes & they stay securely in place. The material is strong so the bag doesn't collapse. The only thing is I feel like the zipper might break if I pull to hard. I just hope it lasts because it's perfect, to the point that I want to buy a second one in case anything happens to this one.
customer_reviews.author: OMS

customer_reviews.title: Zipper failed
customer_reviews.text: Bought in January and loved it but zipper already broke
customer_reviews.author: Moses Family

customer_reviews.title: Broke After One Day
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and really had high hopes for it, since there were a TON of great reviews. However, the day I received the makeup case, I put everything into it, which wasn't a lot. Once I tried to zip the case shut, the pull tab on the zipper fell off! I will be returning this asap and will continue my hunt for a great makeup case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for my wife.
customer_reviews.text: My wife had been looking for a make up case for a while. Unfortunately she was not able to find one to match her quality or needs. I went on Amazon and quickly was able to find this. She was full of joy and excitement when she received it and indicated this was the best one she's ever seen. This will make a great gift for a love one or friend that needs a new makeup case. Also it's very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Serv

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, the zipper fell off. Misleading size. Very small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Only Case I Need
customer_reviews.text: I a busy working mom, and i do my makeup in my car when I get to work every morning (this allows me to sleep longer and get ahead of bad traffic). As such, all of my makeup lives in a travel bag. I subscribed to a monthly makeup box a few months ago and my bag quickly ran out of room. This ROWNYEON bag is exactly what I need for my makeup on the go routine. I really love the brush holder and that it has a cover to protect the brushes from contact with the other items in the bag. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Triz

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was sturdy bag but a week after purchasing it one zipper got broken. Now, 3 months later second one is broken and can't be used. I reached out to customer service but nobody responded back when first zipper got broken. Extremely disappointed since it was an Xmas present for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: bahtiyar kutuk

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a makeup bag for ALL of my makeup rather than travel. I am new to the "makeup every day" scene in my 30s. I was using several small bags to keep stuff in but it took a bit too long to pull everything out and put it back up. This fits everything wonderfully and reduces the space all the bags took up. Looks clean and neat on the shelf too. Lovely bag. I ordered the mini. It's about the size of a childs insulated lunch box. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany R.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Don’t normally bother to write reviews, but I am so disappointed! Took this make up case out of the box, and when I went to unzip it, the zippers pulled off. Very poorly made!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel! Ordered this while out of town. It's padded. Holds just enough of my make up essentials. A few of my brushes (Sephora and Morphe) do not fit in the slots under the flap but it doesn't bother me. They do fit in the zipper slot. I took out all the dividers. They took up too much room for me. Other than that I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: TriSaraht0ps

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag so I could carry my products with me for a family vacation instead of letting the airport transporters crush my stuff. It is so incredibly durable and holds just enough. For size comparison, Too Faced's Natural Love or a Morphe 35 palette fits in on top of the separators. If your brushes are too long, the bristles will get bent or crushed. The separators are Velcro, so you can remove them relatively easily if you want to. The interior zipper feels a little more cheaply made, but it works. The pocket it zips is smallish, but it can hold a couple of packs of lashes well.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Terrible. Terrible. I literally received it today and the zipper broke. Also the Velcro won’t hold.. don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: ZOE

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to take on my last vacation because now that I've upgraded my makeup collection from Le Target to big girl stores like Ulta, I didn't want my fancy expensive makeup sloshing around in my bag. Happy to say that it served its purpose and I now utilize it for every day use as well. All the little compartments/sections are great. My only problem is that I may need a larger one soon to hold my growing collection...first world probz.
customer_reviews.author: starbright

customer_reviews.title: I'd like one of those, too.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a different case for our daughter, when it was offered by Amazon as a special "lightning deal". Mom got a look at it, when it was delivered (on time and as promised). Had to find another for mom. It's a nice case. The price, though not as sweet as the lightning price, was good, and the order was smooth and timely as promised.
customer_reviews.author: jay watkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this at the last minute for an important business trip. I needed something compact that could carry all of my makeup, skin care, and other personal items and this did the trick. Not only is it deceptively roomy, but it kept everything organized throughout travel and through the trip. Loved it. I've been shopping for something like this for months and everything was so expensive. I'm blown away that I was able to get something that was exactly what I needed at such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. So far so good. Fits everything i need. I love all the little compartments. I kind of find myself wanting to over fill it so it’s hard to close. If you have a lot of makeup it might now fit but just for like basic everyday makeup items should be fine and more. I just wish it was a tad bigger i guess but i’m still 100% happy with my purchase and i would definitely recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: lasette

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and functional bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a couple of different makeup bags to house cosmetics, brushes, etc. This bag is amazing! the size is perfect--not too large and SO much fits inside. What I especially love: 1) it's well-constructed and sturdy--I don't feel as it anything will get crushed. 2) the large bottom storage area it comes with little velcro dividers that you can position to make compartments so items don't knock around and are somewhat protected. Really love this little bag!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy!!! Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I love Amazon, delivery was just as they said 2 day, love this make up case! I have tried many things even a tool box to put my make up in. This has a place for my brushes and I can put make up in different compartments or pull the Velcro dividers out and have just one big space and it has s handle for carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Rickie Ward

customer_reviews.title: Drone bag?
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a 2 week trip in Europe and didn't like it as much as some other bags I own. The material inside gave me...wait, how do I describe it? Like nails on chalkboard feeling. My hubby decided he wouldn't let it go to waste and used it for his drone.
customer_reviews.author: Primarily an Amazonian Princess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bag for travel
customer_reviews.text: Love this portable travel bag. I was able to put all my travel products in it and it fit perfectly in my suitcase. I like that it will not get squashed in my suitcase and that it's big enough to also fit on the hotel counter. My husband now uses it in his gym bag for his toiletries. Guess I will be purchasing myself one for my next trip!
customer_reviews.author: JetNoise

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally after looking for many years (decade) this is the perfect makeup bag for me. I’ve never been able to find just the “right” one but this did it!!! I love that the brushes are kept together nicely and covered so nothing happens to them! I love it!! It fits right into my suitcase or carry all bag! High quality too! There are Velcro moving dividers which is great!! Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lynn f

customer_reviews.title: This is great for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is great for travel, however, I am not a really big fan of the top flap that holds the brushes because it gets in the way and is cumbersome when open. I got this bag to use in my small bathroom because I needed something compact to store all of my makeup supplies in, and it's great for storing but takes up a lot of space on my counter when I'm using it. Overall it's really good quality, it's size and bulkiness is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: I can fit A TON in this case!
customer_reviews.text: As you can see I pack this thing pretty good and it closes up just fine with no strain. Size is great - not to big, but you can really fit a lot. There is a spot for brushes or whatever on the inside of the top along with a zipper compartment underneath. Also, in the upper part of the main case there are a couple of dividers that attach with Velcro - so you can move them and tailor the size of compartments. I don’t know how durable it will be in the long run, but so far it has held up very well. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KKCMAX

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Makeup Case
customer_reviews.text: This is the Best makeup case! I keep my makeup in it all the time. It makes it so easy to organize your makeup with the compartments for foundations, powders and shadows and the pockets for the makeup brushes, eye pencils, tweezers, etc. I can put my makeup on so much quicker now since everything is so easy to find. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hod

customer_reviews.title: Great size for traveling !
customer_reviews.text: This makeup bag has come in so handy ! I was in need for something that would hold my everyday makeup in one place , and also offer the option to customize the inner compartments , you can do just that with the velcro , removable padded dividers , great to organize your powders , palettes , foundations etc... Also the pouches are great for storing smaller items like primers , mascara etc... All in all , great size , easy and functional , great bag !
customer_reviews.author: Tekino

customer_reviews.title: This make up train can hold a lot
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return this because I wanted the one with a more harder divider. This has the soft one , but to my surprise I was able to transfer all the make up from all 3 smaller makeup bag I was currently using and I kinda like the divider being soft material which would really protect my makeups when traveling...
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Corazon H Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup bag!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bag, very well made with smart design features. Fits and keeps all my cosmetics and brushes nicely organized both at home and on travel. I added a zip pouch from another makeup bag that velcroed nicely inside the long compartment to keep my eye pencils separate from lip pencils and gloss. An additional compartment here would have been handy if I didn't have that pouch. Could be just a little smaller too - maybe flatter - as it takes up a fair amount of space in my suitcase. Other than that, it's about the most perfect travel makeup case I've found to date.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel and I love that the sections are ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits so much stuff. Perfect for travel and I love that the sections are adjustable and removable.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case, I bought it for traveling but I use it daily now. I put the makeup that I use daily in it. The compartments are good sized and it fits a lot. It’s made nice too. For using it daily for the last two months it’s held up really well! I will buy another if need be!
customer_reviews.author: CMM

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice high quality organizer
customer_reviews.text: Update on my review. Very very nice high quality organizer. Though next time I will buy the bigger one. The company customer service is brilliant! They really care and reach out to make sure you are happy. 5 Star service without a doubt, you are in good hands.
customer_reviews.author: James Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great case, but too big!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great makeup case, but it was way too big for traveling, which is what I wanted it for. Perhaps that was my mistake and I didn't read the dimensions properly. I suppose if you are a makeup artist or you wear a lot of makeup, it's perfect but it was way too big for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Zacks

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and compact
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I use it for everything and I’ve had it for years. It’s lasted me forever and it’s very convenient. The Velcro sections on the inside are adjustable and easy to move. Lots of zippers and pockets for brushes. I will buy another one once mine breaks down on me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: It is made of sturdy material and the zipper seems strong enough to last ...
customer_reviews.text: This make up bag is just what I was looking for. It is made of sturdy material and the zipper seems strong enough to last a while. It fits perfectly in my bathroom drawer, but it is large enough to easily fit all of my makeup. I love the adjustable compartments. The velcro is strong enough so they don't slip, but not overly difficult to move. Some of my makeup has left marks on the black surface of the bag, but it was easily removed with a damp cloth. If I was to order again, I would order the one with the white trim so it would be easier to tell which side was the top.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great make bag!  Replacing my other makeup bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cosmetic bag since the removal dividers offer the flexibility to rearrange your type of items easily. The only things I wish were different were: 1) More color choices as this almost looks likes my husbands hygiene bag and 2) The material was different. But those aren’t significant downfalls to not recommend purchasing this product... just my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on-the-go
customer_reviews.text: Everything i need in one bag, with room for tissues, cloths, and other 'helpers'. I have had it over a month, drug it around everywhere, and none of my powders have broken. I am very pleased. I have one for day-time make-up and another for night time make-up. I wish they came in various colors for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling or just keeping things tidy
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for traveling and/or just keeping all your makeup tidy. I really like how organized it is and it’s very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Marli1222

customer_reviews.title: Well made bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for myself to use for makeup but my husband asked to borrow it for it's usefulness as a small camera bag and uses it to store small gadgets now. The dividers are velcro and can be taken out completely or adjusted to a wide array of configurations. Well made bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. R

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is great for travel in that it keeps my makeup organized. Love the ability to “personalize” the compartment sizes via the velcro. One complaint is that mine did not have individual pockets for makeup brushes, it was one large pocket making it difficult to organize.
customer_reviews.author: MaG4

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose. All a girl like me needs for carrying makeup.
customer_reviews.text: It’s good, but it can get messy very easily! Like makeup splotches will stain it and you have to maintain it. Otherwise, it does it’s job. I’m not someone that needs a whole lot to bring with me, so this is more than enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: RedLovesBlack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toiletries travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this case for taking all my makeup, soaps and toiletries when I go to a hotel for a few nights. It's perfect for keeping everything organized. I'm getting a second one for the rest of the family to put their travel stuff in.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not sure this is an authentic product. I am returning this after receiving a beautifully packaged larger item made by a company that sent me a truly authentic product with card for registration- not a cardboard box with the logo not even close to what’s pictured
customer_reviews.author: CPTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup case and affordable too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on my sisters recommendation- “This makeup bag is awesome” On upon opening I was wondering how much I was going to like this. Seemed small. However, it is not. Plenty of room and compartments. The compartments are just right. Look small but actually perfect and you can see everything you have. Always storing things vertically are more eye appealing and easier to see. Love this makeup case!
customer_reviews.author: Cattleman'swife

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product and was fairly happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and was fairly happy with it. I had read the reviews and it definitely fits more than you think it would and keeps everything secure. I also like the handle on it. I have used this twice and it holds everything I need. you can adjust the compartments in the bottom half with the velcro
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Crompton

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about a month now, and I am really enjoying this! It keeps everything separated great, and doesn't jumble all around. I have had issues in the past with eye shadows breaking, etc - but this one has kept everything in place and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Now my makeup is organized and not a mess!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Rownyeon Makeup bag and i love it. Its a lot bigger than i thought and thats great. Enough room to have all my makeup divided and not all over the place. In my bag I have about 9 brushed and 2 mascaras that fit in the pouches and there is enough room for more.I love that it has a zipper pocket so i can place q-tips, hair clips and makeup wipes. If you looking to have your divided space a specific size, get the bag that has the movable dividers and not the velcro, as the velcro can only move a few millimeters. All in all...this is a great bag
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! I’ve been wanting a travel case with a brush holder since when traveling those are what get mushed the most. This case is really roomy and the sectioned areas are Velcro so you can customize to fit your makeup the best.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schuky

customer_reviews.title: Great but zipper broke!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! So nice to have everything in one place! I placed all brushes & eyeliners up top; love that they get covered to keep brushes clean. 2 UD Naked palettes in zippered pocket...fit perfect. Made three or 4 custom dividers -- big one for 2 smaller Naked palettes, 2 face primers, eyelash curler, mascaras. Smaller one for all lip glosses. Medium one for eye primers, concealer, eyebrow stuff, eye pencil sharpener. Love love love. However....zipper broke with first use!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cali Clark

customer_reviews.title: This company cares!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW! I had an issue with this makeup bag’s zipper. The company reached out right away and made it right. I appreciate how quickly they solved the situation. For that reason, I am increasing me previous review from 2 stars to 4. OLD REVIEW: I thought this makeup bag was excellent when I first received it. Very portable, perfect size, great compartments. Unfortunately, after very little use, one of the zippers has stopped working. I can move it, but it doesn’t zip. This is a bummer because I feel like it is only a matter of time until my contents will start spilling out. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marcus Anderson

customer_reviews.title: HOLDS EVERYTHING.
customer_reviews.text: Finally something that can hold all my makeup and brushes and it'll all be in one place especially for those rushed early mornings. I just wish it were just a little taller in height so I could shove a couple of my pallets and zip it properly. I think I just may need to organize my stuff a little neater to make it happen.
customer_reviews.author: Krishnil Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Seller is quick to recitfy if a problem occurs.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size and seems durable, but some of my makeup is too long for it, and it does not hold many pallets. I would have purchased something else had I been aware of that. Edited to add: the zipper broke after less than a week. Edited a second time to add: the seller was quick to contact me and rectify the situation. I appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Interesting
customer_reviews.text: Would’ve been perfect for home storage. Thought it was too bulky for travel, especially light/shirty travel. Sections kind of made it awkward for many of my products. But I never got to truly try it out because I had to return, the zipper was faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Lola J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this makeup case for a little over a month now and it is perfect! I bought it for my summer trip to the beach, but have been using it as an everyday makeup bag since. It holds SO much makeup and fits great in a suitcase. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: I like my makeup layed out (like at home) this bag ...
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and I am excited to be using this bag on my trip. I like my makeup layed out (like at home) this bag is made to let your items stay in the bag, yet easy to see and grab what you need. It’s made of good quality, the right size for travel and looks like I will have extra room after adding my items, I will know more after this week of travel.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Well organized
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy! Holds all my stuff and keeps it organized. Within the compartments some things shift but there's definite separation between the compartments. Downside is that it doesn't fit my brushes. And with it's size it definitely takes up a big chunk of the carry on.
customer_reviews.author: C.Mumford

customer_reviews.title: Best make-up organizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this make-up organizer! The perfect size! Hold a ton of make-up and keeps everything in it's own little section. Brushes have their own space too! It's super high quality materials and zippers! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: wiretag

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and Organized
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a bit of makeup and when moving this was the perfect piece to transport it. It held at least 4 palettes for me, which in itself is astounding. I love the little compartments that separate the sections for different types of makeup. Plenty of pockets and compartments. Feels very durable and I love the sturdy handle at the top so it is easy to carry and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Stella G

customer_reviews.title: It can hold A LOT!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this makeup bag. It fits all of my brushes (20), 2 eyeshadow pallets, 2 foundation bottle, 2 concealer tubes, primer, beauty blenders, full size setting powder, full size setting spray, and it still has room!
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Ricia Washington

customer_reviews.title: Never have I ever been so organized
customer_reviews.text: Loving this case. I would highly recommend for anyone who's messy like me and gets tired of digging through makeup bags to find certain products... holds a TON of stuff also.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My mistake .... when does one put makeup in a one position compartment 🙃🥺 so I travel .... need everything standing up. For those of you who don’t travel .... this is the product to use 👍
customer_reviews.author: susana5019

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend This Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bag that allowed me to organize makeup and a few toiletries for a recent trip, greatly simplifying my life! There is a place for everything in a very smart design which could be a carry-on. But it's also good to know that you don't have to worry about potential spills onto your clothing if you opt to pack within a larger checked bag! I love it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Must have for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo so so happy with this purchase. I’d been looking at youtube reviews and comments and ran into this case and it’s literally the perfect size to hold all of the makeup i’m going to travel with. The case feels really sturdy and durable. I love the fact that the compartments can be arranged to fit the size of your needs and the brush area has a velcro cover to keep your brushes protected. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... essentials for a destination wedding - and it was perfect! I love how organized everything is and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this to pack up my makeup / essentials for a destination wedding - and it was perfect! I love how organized everything is and the individual compartments. Wonderful makeup case for travel. Sturdy, and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for makeup living travlers.
customer_reviews.text: Very practical easy to use. Took this with me on one of my recent trips. My makeup stayed put and very organized the whole trip. The quality is pretty good it has padding in it so if it drops your makeup will be fine. Would definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I purchased this makeup case. I don’t use it for travel much, but it does make a good space to store a lot of my makeup at home so it isn’t cluttering my desk. Lots of pockets, compartments that you can slightly adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have to re-arrange my makeup once!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly versatile case! I travel a ton and got tired of lugging around multiple pouches for my skincare, makeup and brushes. This takes it all in very nicely, and my brushes did not get damaged at all! It was extremely easy to take the bag out of my suitcase and sit it in front of any mirror to get ready. Never had to upturn or re-arrange once during my trip!
customer_reviews.author: Zizi

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect to keep it all in one place
customer_reviews.text: I use this for travel for all of our cords, plugs, and devices. It's perfect to keep it all in one place. So often before, we'd lose cords and have no idea which bag they were in. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: NnH

customer_reviews.title: Very nice makeup case!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice case. The sections are big and can be adjusted to size. There are lots of pockets and nothing should get crushed in travel.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am taking the time to write a review because this bag is great. I literally travel with it everywhere I go. It holds everything in place including my brushes. I like the extra zipper pocket on the top of the inside flap. Overall good makeup bag for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great concept but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: good sized, has velcro compartment walls so you can adjust the size of each section. fits two bottles of liquid foundation, multiple bronzer/blush compacts, powder, lipsticks, two eyeshadow pallettes, and all of my brushes. i loved it until the handle of the zippers fell off- both of them fell off within a month. It was a huge pain to unzip the makeup bag without the zipper handles so I ended up switching back to my old makeup bag. loved it but disappointed I couldn’t use it longer
customer_reviews.author: burmy

customer_reviews.title: Great for makeup beginners.
customer_reviews.text: It is bigger then I expected I bought this about a couple of months back when I was first getting into makeup. It was good for a while but now i have outgrown it. I do recommend this to somebody that is just starting out or somebody with a lot but whats a travel bag with them. This is a very cheaper started bag though i do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag and holds all my cosmetics. When I travel, I just zip it and it's ready to go with everything in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Kimball

customer_reviews.title: including hanging bags with separate zippered compartments but just couldn't find one that she was satisfied with. I was hesitant about her buying this ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has tons of makeup and brushes. She has tried numerous bags, including hanging bags with separate zippered compartments but just couldn't find one that she was satisfied with. I was hesitant about her buying this one because of the size. I was wrong. It holds everything and displays it so nicely. She likes organization and this one serves her well.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: the more I wanted better storage for my make-up
customer_reviews.text: The more I travel, the more I wanted better storage for my make-up. This was absolutely perfect and keeps everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.B.

customer_reviews.title: Made sturdy. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for your everyday makeup. I needed something to keep my everyday makeup in. This is perfect. Great size, not too big and not too little. Made of sturdy material, I expect it to last a long time. I’m going to order a second one for fingernail polish.
customer_reviews.author: Shianne Justice

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to chime in with the rest of those who have put the reviews about the zipper. Such a disappointment!!! The bag overall was pretty great until the zipper broke. I used it everyday and traveled with it and once the zipper broke it became useless. Hopefully they will see all the comments about the zipper and fix the product. On the look out for a new bag that is more durable. I would not buy this bag until they fix this defect with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tlipps

customer_reviews.title: Zippers broke I want a refund!!
customer_reviews.text: Zippers broke cheap China metal!! I was expecting it to last me at least 2 in a half years I’m very mad😡
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Goncalves

customer_reviews.title: I am really disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product for a few months and the zipper already broke. I barely used it and the last time I took it on a trip the entire zipper broke and all of my makeup fell out of the bag. I am really disappointed with this product. All of the reviews seemed great and the bag seemed durable but zipper is extremely cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Vinh le

customer_reviews.title: So So Happy
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this! I’ve used so many different makeup bags for travel but none of them fit everything I needed especially not in a way to keep things organized but this makeup bag was truly a game changer for me! Fit everything I needed perfectly and was able to organize everything. Quality is great for the price especially. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan T.

customer_reviews.title: Bomb A$$ Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag for my girlfriend for Christmas. Upon receiving it, she was very pleased. The bag has great organizational capabilities and does a superb job at keeping everything in order according to her. It was convenient to carry and held all of her makeup easily, and it was relatively inexpensive as well (especially for the quality). The company even emailed me to make sure the bag arrived on time and we were pleased with the purchase. Excellent product. Very useful. Great company. We are both wonderfully pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dawson A. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup bag! You won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: Where do I begin this bag is amazing. I needed a good travel makeup up to take to the gym and this has been the best bag ever. Keeps all my makeup organized it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So functional!
customer_reviews.text: Great makeup organizer. Simple yet functional. I commute to work and spend a lot of time in my car, this is perfect to travel back and forth with. I no longer have to use a ton of separate bags to organize.
customer_reviews.author: Mar T

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: This case is fantastic. I’ve been looking for something to pack both my make up and brushes securely when I travel for shows and this is it. Also it’s small enough that it fits nicely into my carry on suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Price

customer_reviews.title: Well made and has lots of uses
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions were given - I just thought it would be bigger. (my mistake) It was too small for all my makeup. I ended up using it to organize my telescope lenses and accessories. It works great - they are tidy and well protected.
customer_reviews.author: TooMuchStuff

customer_reviews.title: It does the trick of having a lot of different compartments and I like that it separates the makeup brushes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this looking for a new makeup case. It does the trick of having a lot of different compartments and I like that it separates the makeup brushes. However, it isn't actually that easy to clean and I still have the issue that I have with most makeup cases that the makeup powder is everywhere and it isn't easily wiped off. The bottom half is actually a cloth that is more fit for a camera bag, it's really hard to get makeup out of.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: I had higher hopes for this... I ...
customer_reviews.text: I had higher hopes for this... I wanted something that I could put all of my products in and this just isn't big enough. And I don't even have that much makeup :(
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: ... dump everything in a one compartment makeup bag and hate digging through it and this item solves all my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I go traveling a lot and always dump everything in a one compartment makeup bag and hate digging through it and this item solves all my problems. Very light-weight and not too big but still leaves plenty of room for my makeup, perfumes and even jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wash to wash. Easy to store. Love it. Never even thought would find so very well organized stuff
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the first makeup bag that didn't feel flimsy. It has rigid compartments to keep my toiletries from being crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It so organised!! I did end up buying a larger hard case though as this is literally this forst make up case Ive ever owned, its a solid started and I’m sad I’m not able to use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Small but spacious! Perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite bloggers suggested this bag and I had been looking for a travel makeup bag for an upcoming trip - I was sceptical of purchasing this because of the cheap price, but it’s a great bag! It’s a great quality and SO spacious! I’m shocked that all my makeup and toiletries fit in it! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Moore

customer_reviews.title: It's a sturdy small bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup bag, small storage containers are perfect for different types of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect makeup bag!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I did before I had this bag! I have used it for several overnight trips & most recently a wedding. It holds all my makeup, palettes & a full set of brushes. The best part is it keeps my liquid foundation upright to prevent spills or messes when it's in my carryon & on flights. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Seuner

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: So after seeing this on a few different blogger sites, I decided to make the purchase and very glad I did. This has so much room (I got the small one) and i LOVE the organization!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Cook

customer_reviews.title: Best make up bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this make up bag!! Everything fits, brushes have a separate slot so they don't get squished. Tons of room and fits nicely in my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: doglover

product_meta.title: ROWNYEON Makeup Train Case Makeup Bag Organizer Travel Makeup Case Cosmetic Bag Proffessional Portable Storage Bag for Cosmetics Makeup Brushes Gift for Girls Women 9.8'' Mini Black
feature_bullets: ❤Characteristic: Waterproof, shake proof, anti-wear and spill-proof interiors,it's a multi-protective mini makeup bag.
❤Durable Material: Made of oxford fabric, smooth zippers, sponge dividers inside, and plastic cover. Choosing high-quality materials to make the makeup bag more durable.
❤Humanity Design: DIY your internal compartments by the adjustable padded dividers, suitable for both home , travel and men's items storage.

❤Dimension: 9.8" x 9.1" x 3.5". Easily carry cosmetics makeup tools like lipstick, eye shadow, or men's shaving kit, fit 7 inches makeup brushes and 3 inches lipstick. Mini size saves more space for the suitcase.

❤Excellent Protection: Hand strap for keeping your makeup safe and handy, water-resistant lining and plastic brushes cover are easy to wiped clean, never worry about spillage in or stain the makeup train case.
